html: 6.7.17  11:30 am   "6.7.17 1:38 am" you mention a randomization system when asked about the saxophone in your new song. how is the randomization system responsible for the saxophone in the song, which the user asking the question commented that you don't use that often? is this the same randomization system you use for picking songs or is it some kind of instrument randomization system?
